text: 300px Judith and Holofernes is a painting of in oils on canvas by the studio of Jacopo Tintoretto; it was previously considered to be an autograph work from the painter's youth. Previously owned by the Marquis of La Ensenada, it entered the Spanish royal collection in 1760 and is now in the Museo del Prado. ==References== * category:Paintings of the Museo del Prado by Italian artists category:1577 paintings Tintoretto
title: Judith and Holofernes (studio of Tintoretto)
